objectives.en: The aim of this course is to give an overview of visual communication methods, design principles and their application through web based or free software in different fields.
objectives.et: Õppeaine eesmärk on anda teadmised visuaalse kommunikatsiooni  ja  graafilise disaini põhimõtetest ning nende rakenduslikest aspektidest veebipõhiste või vabavaraliste programmide näitel.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
7) has acquired design and presentation skills;
learning_outcomes.et: 7)	on omandanud infodisaini ja infoesitluse oskused;

learning_outcomes.en: 8) has acquired web-site creation and management skills.
